# Dependency and Critical Path Mapping

Use this skill to make schedule risk explicit before committing milestones.

## Required outputs

1. Dependency graph
2. Critical path chain
3. Single points of failure
4. Mitigation and fallback options

## Template

- [Dependency map template](./templates/dependency-map.md)
